lead_paragraph: The Colts’ decision to rest their starters raised anew the issue of how teams plan for games after clinching a playoff spot.
snippet: The Colts’ decision to rest their starters raised anew the issue of how teams plan for games after clinching a playoff spot.

headline.main: Committee Could Rule on Resting of Starters
headline.seo: Rules Committee Could Review the Resting of Starters
headline.print_headline: Committee Could Rule On Resting Of Starters
